name: Wild side of the rainbow
description: Well it's been almost a year since I crafted this recipe for the Vegas show. We were told liquid barn, and Chef flavors, we're going to carry all of the recipes as one shots, and so I have been sitting on it. Pretty clear that's not going to happen ðŸ˜… hope you guys enjoy I really think this is one of the finest recipes I have crafted. It is missing the honeydew if your honeydew fan a little bit of FLV honeydew will probably do the trick. I was happy with it the way it was and so....
author: Chrisdvr1

reviews.text: What exactly is a little bit of Honeydew? Could you elaborate please? I'd like to try this. thanks
